subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the Menu UI component.

subMembers.name: adaptivityEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether adaptive rendering is enabled. This property is in effect only if the [orientation] is *"horizontal"*.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: String | Array<dxMenuItem> | Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | null

subMembers.name: hideSubmenuOnMouseLeave
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not the submenu is hidden when the mouse pointer leaves it.

subMembers.name: orientation
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the menu has horizontal or vertical orientation.

subMembers.name: delay
subMembers.description: Specifies the delay in submenu showing and hiding.

subMembers.name: hide
subMembers.description: The time span after which the submenu is hidden.

subMembers.name: show
subMembers.description: The time span after which the submenu is shown.

subMembers.name: showFirstSubmenuMode
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for showing and hiding the first level submenu.

subMembers.name: submenuDirection
subMembers.description: Specifies the direction at which the submenus are displayed.

properties.name: dxMenu
properties.description: The Menu UI component is a panel with clickable items. A click on an item opens a drop-down menu, which can contain several submenus.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onItemClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onItemContextMenu
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is right-clicked or pressed.

Events.name: onItemRendered
Events.description: A function that is executed after a collection item is rendered.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is selected or selection is canceled.

Events.name: onSubmenuHidden
Events.description: A function that is executed after a submenu is hidden.

Events.name: onSubmenuHiding
Events.description: A function that is executed before a submenu is hidden.

Events.name: onSubmenuShowing
Events.description: A function that is executed before a submenu is displayed.

Events.name: onSubmenuShown
Events.description: A function that is executed after a submenu is displayed.

Events.name: submenuHidden
Events.description: Raised after a submenu is hidden.

Events.name: submenuHiding
Events.description: Raised before a submenu is hidden.

Events.name: submenuShowing
Events.description: Raised before a submenu is displayed.

Events.name: submenuShown
Events.description: Raised after a submenu is displayed.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemClickEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemClick] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemContextMenuEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemContextMenu] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemRenderedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemRendered] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: SelectionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [selectionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: SubmenuDirection
Types.description: Specifies the direction at which the submenus are displayed.

subMembers.name: SubmenuHiddenEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [submenuHidden] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: SubmenuHidingEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [submenuHiding] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: SubmenuShowingEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [submenuShowing] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: SubmenuShownEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [submenuShown] event handler's argument.
